titleStmt.title: For the souldiers, and all the officers of England, Scotland and Ireland a warning from the Lord, that they forget not his kindness, but call to mind his mercies, and their own promises.
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: My name in the flesh is Edward Burrough, one of them whom the world calls Quakers.
Second page consists of ms. note from Thomason: "These pampholetts [sic] went out this last Parliament..."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
